coded_answer.p: I saw your advertismentadvertisement offor your show inat the circle theatre, over the rainbow. I went to it, but I was really disappointed about some thingsomething.

First the musical show, Over the Rainbow, started at 20:15, and in the advertisement it was written that it would start at 19:30, then. Then it also waswas also written that the actor was Danny Brook, but in the show appeared a different actora different actor appeared, that was really disappointing. Also it was written in the advertismentadvertisement that some discounts were available, but there wasn'tweren't any discounts. And because of the time that the show started I couldn't wentgo to the theatre restaurant because it was closed.
MrSir, I was very disappointed with the show so I want my money back, and I am sure you will understand my reasons.

Unfortunately, Pat wasn't very good at keeping secrets, and she went to her house to speaktalk about the things I had told her. First she said to her father, then to her mother and finally to her brother, that I was from another planet called Orion, that was a billion kilometerkilometrekilometres distance offrom Earth and thatthen I was so ashamed because I have been hisher boyfriend since I have camecame to Earth.

My confession caused a disaster in the life of her andher life and that of her family, and they called the police to take me outoff of the planet or to be arrested, so that I can'tcouldn't see her again.
The police caught me, when I was peacefully in my room, and put me, covered with something, in a car. After they caught me I think they brought me to the Area 57, werewhere the police do experiments.
Since then I livehave lived in Area 57, and this is my diary life. I don't now when I andam going to be free, for goingto go to my planet.
